column4: hey i need help. MY screen resolution is too small and i have tried many ways to sort the problem out. I have enabled restricted drives and installed the latest ati drivers ( i have a radeon). so then i used the command sudo dpkg-reconfigure -phigh xserver-xorg . And i chose "vese" and then a higher a resolution then rebooted ctrl alt and backspace. THIS STILL DOESNT WORK I A STILL LEFT WITH THE DEFAult resoltuion sizes. so please
can someone help me sort this out. thanks
